name: THE INTERNET INFRASTRUCTURE COALITION (I2COALITION)
description: Trade Assoc. for entities operating the structure supporting the Internet
sampleDescriptions: Issues related to data protection and breach notification, privacy, encryption and cybersecurity
FISA section 702 reform, reform of the Electronic Communications Privacy Act (ECPA), encryption technology
General trade issues, digital trade issues, cross-border data flows, NAFTA and issues related to sec. 230 of the Communications Decency Act
Issues related to internet governance and cloud computing
Issues related to intellectual property: online copyright infringement and third party liability issues, DMCA reform including section 512, copyright office reform, patent litigation reform
